problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, BC = N_0, BD bisects ∠ABC, crossing point A to draw AD ⊥ BD at point D, and crossing point D to draw DE ∥ CB, intersecting AB and AC at points E and F respectively, if EF = 2 DF, then the length of AB is ()
raw_answer: 解:如图,延长AD,BC交于点G,∵BD平分∠ABC,∴∠ABD=∠GBD,∵AD⊥BD于点D,∴∠ADB=∠GDB=90°,又∵BD=BD,∴△ABD≌△GBD(ASA),∴AB=BG,∴D是AG的中点,又∵DE∥BG,∴E是AB的中点,F是AC的中点,∴DE是△ABG的中位线,EF是△ABC的中位线,∴EF=\frac{1}{2}BC=2,又∵EF=2DF,∴DF=1,∴DE=3,∴BG=2DE=6,∴AB=6,故选:B．
